
"Coastos" could refer to Costas Cotsiolis, a renowned Greek
classical guitarist, or it could be a shortened or altered form
 of the Greek name Kostas. Costas is derived from Konstantinos,
 meaning "constant" or "steady". In addition, there is Costas Kadis,
 a Cypriot politician and current European Commissioner for Fisheries and Oceans.
 He has previously held positions like
 Minister of Education, Culture, and Minister
of Agriculture, Rural Development and Environment. 
Hello Nepal
